1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Suffix and prefix.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Base.Text.Suffix
6  ( unprefix,
7    unsuffix,
8    uniqueNames,
9  ) where
10
11import qualified Data.Map.Strict                   as Map
12import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture          as O
13import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base.List         as B
14
15-- | Remove characters-delimiter prefix.
16--
17--   >>> unprefix (`elem` "0123456789") '-' "12-foo"
18--   "foo"
19--
20unprefix :: O.Test Char -> Char -> O.StringMap
21unprefix test del s = loop s where
22    loop [] = s
23    loop (c:cs) | test c      = loop cs
24                | c == del    = cs
25                | otherwise   = s
26
27-- | Remove delimiter-characters suffix.
28--
29--   >>> unsuffix (`elem` "0123456789") '-' "foo-12"
30--   "foo"
31--
32unsuffix :: O.Test Char -> Char -> O.StringMap
33unsuffix test del = B.reverseMap $ unprefix test del
34
35-- | Two-argument function which returns a constant value.
36--
37--   >>> const2 "c" True ()
38--   "c"
39--
40const2 :: a -> b -> c -> a
41const2 a _ _ = a
42
43-- | Make names unique by adding integer suffixes.
44--
45--   >>> uniqueNames '-' $ words "a b b c"
46--   ["a", "b-1", "b-2", "c"]
47--
48uniqueNames :: Char -> O.Map [String]
49uniqueNames del xs = O.uneith <$> uniqueNamesEith del (Left <$> xs)
50
51uniqueNamesEith :: Char -> O.Map [O.Eith String]
52uniqueNamesEith del xxs = loop False (Map.map intSuffixes dup) xxs [] where
53    loop b m (Left x : xs) ys
54        = case Map.lookup x m of
55            Just (n : ns) -> let m' = Map.insert x ns m
56                             in loop True m' xs (Right (x ++ n) : ys)
57            _             -> loop b m xs (Left x : ys)
58    loop b m (x : xs) ys  = loop b m xs (x : ys)
59    loop True  _ [] ys    = uniqueNamesEith del $ reverse ys
60    loop False _ [] ys    = reverse ys  -- completed
61
62    dup = Map.filter (> 0) $ duplicateMap $ map name xxs
63
64    duplicateMap :: (Ord a) => [(a, Int)] -> Map.Map a Int
65    duplicateMap = Map.fromListWith $ const2 1
66
67    name (Left  x) = (x, 0)
68    name (Right x) = (x, 0)
69
70-- | Generate list of integer suffixes.
71--
72--   >>> take 5 $ intSuffixes 1
73--   ["-1", "-2", "-3", "-4", "-5"]
74--
75intSuffixes :: Int -> [String]
76intSuffixes i = ('-' : show i) : intSuffixes (i + 1)
77
